 
 Sharma Ji has decided to marry. He is fond of palindromes and so he has decided to marry a girl whose name can be arranged as a palindrome. So the only condition which Sharma ji has kept is that the name of the girl could be rearranged to a palindrome. Given names of N girls, you need to determine how many of N girls are eligible to marry Sharma ji. 
 

Input
The first line of input contains an integer N, denoting the number of names. Then N names follow.

For each N there will be a name(string) given. The  String contains only lowercase characters. 

 

Output
Print the number of girls who fulfill sharma ji's condition.
 

Constraints

1 ≤ N ≤ 10^3
1 ≤ |S| ≤ 10^7

Example
Input:
2

aannk
aditya

Output:

1
 

Explanation

The second name cannot be changed to a palindrome but the first can be changed into palindrome and one of the possible name can be kanak.
